solution_line_template: Carl needs to sell {goal_cupcakes} cupcakes + {payment_cupcakes} cupcakes = <<{goal_cupcakes}+{payment_cupcakes}={total_cupcakes_needed}>>{total_cupcakes_needed} cupcakes total.
Each day Carl needs to sell {total_cupcakes_needed} cupcakes / {num_days} days = <<{total_cupcakes_needed}/{num_days}={cupcakes_per_day}>>{cupcakes_per_day} cupcakes to reach his goal.
